Name: Tequila Alexander
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
10 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Creamy tequila and chocolate this tequila-based riff on the classic Brandy Alexander is deliciously indulgent.
History: Created in February 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England. See: Alexander cocktails and their history
Nutrition: One serving of Tequila Alexander contains 236 calories
